casebody.data:
NO. CAAP-16-0000599 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. May 25, 2018

MEMORANDUM OPINION

Carolyn Lai YOSHIMOTO, as Successor Trustee under that certain General Revocable Trust Agreement dated March 27, 1991, made by Lily Tom Lai, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Harrison Y.H. LAI, Individually and as Successor Trustee under that certain General Revocable Trust Agreement dated March 27, 1991, made by Henry S.L. Lai, Defendant-Appellant,
and
Kellie F.T. Lai, Defendant-Appellee

Affirmed.
